transcription.text: Hello? Hello? Hello? Ah, sino pa? Ah, sino po sila? Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: For account security purposes, yung last 4-digit na nakaregister sa Maya, is 4839, tama po?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kasi sir, upon checking po sir, sa system namin, meron pa po kayong outstanding balance, sir. Sa Maya, credit po ninyo sir, na 5,427.58 centavos. Then one day
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: past due na po niya, sir. May po kasi sir, ng immediate settlement
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: for today, since pinapapriority na po siya, sir, ni Maya. Maya Bank.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ah. Eh, kanya lang, may hindi ako makakano ngayon kasi nasa malayo pa ako. Sino?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hindi po ba kayo ko, sir,
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi. No. Okay. Walang ano, walang access. Uh, yun nga. Walang problema eh. Walang asing access eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige, sir. Bibigyan ko po kayo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Monday po, sir. Hanggang Monday lang po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi. Hindi pa ako, hindi pa ako makakano. Siguro baka Thursday pa.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige, sir. Inonote na lang po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: At, ah, pakinoot mo, Thursday, Friday, ha? Para sigurado, ha?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Kasi travel pa ako na, eh. Travel pa ako. Ako na, eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: No. Hindi natin maano sitwasyon ng traffic, eh. Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Okay. Ah, thank you, thank you, ha? Okay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sir. Sige po. Sige po sa kanila, sir.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Hello? Hello? Hello? Ah, sino pa? Ah, sino po sila? Okay.
translation.english: Hello? Hello? Hello? Ah, who is this? Ah, who are you? Okay.

translation.tagalog: For account security purposes, yung last 4-digit na nakaregister sa Maya, is 4839, tama po?
translation.english: For account security purposes, the last 4-digit number registered in Maya is 4839, is that correct?

translation.tagalog: Kasi sir, upon checking po sir, sa system namin, meron pa po kayong outstanding balance, sir. Sa Maya, credit po ninyo sir, na 5,427.58 centavos. Then one day
translation.english: Because sir, upon checking our system, you still have an outstanding balance on your Maya Credit of 5,427.58 pesos. Then one day

translation.tagalog: past due na po niya, sir. May po kasi sir, ng immediate settlement
translation.english: past due already. Immediate settlement is needed, sir.

translation.tagalog: for today, since pinapapriority na po siya, sir, ni Maya. Maya Bank.
translation.english: for today, since it has already been prioritized by Maya Bank.

translation.tagalog: Ah. Eh, kanya lang, may hindi ako makakano ngayon kasi nasa malayo pa ako. Sino?
translation.english: Ah. But I can’t really do anything now because I’m far away. Who is this?

translation.tagalog: Hindi po ba kayo ko, sir,

translation.english: —make a cash-in? Because it’s being prioritized.

translation.tagalog: Hindi. No. Okay. Walang ano, walang access. Uh, yun nga. Walang problema eh. Walang asing access eh.
translation.english: No. No. Okay. There’s no, no access. That’s the issue. There’s really no access.

translation.tagalog: Sige, sir. Bibigyan ko po kayo.

translation.english: Uh-huh. Just take note of it, okay?

translation.tagalog: Monday po, sir. Hanggang Monday lang po.
Hindi. Hindi pa ako, hindi pa ako makakano. Siguro baka Thursday pa.
translation.english: No. I won’t be able to yet. Maybe by Thursday.

translation.tagalog: Sige, sir. Inonote na lang po.
translation.english: Alright, sir. I’ll just make a note of it.

translation.tagalog: At, ah, pakinoot mo, Thursday, Friday, ha? Para sigurado, ha?
translation.english: And please make a note of Thursday or Friday, just to be sure, okay?

translation.tagalog: Kasi travel pa ako na, eh. Travel pa ako. Ako na, eh.
translation.english: Because I’m still travelling. I’m still travelling, myself.

translation.tagalog: No. Hindi natin maano sitwasyon ng traffic, eh. Okay.
translation.english: We really can’t predict traffic conditions. Okay.

translation.tagalog: Okay. Ah, thank you, thank you, ha? Okay.
translation.english: Okay. Ah, thank you, thank you, alright?

translation.tagalog: Sir. Sige po. Sige po sa kanila, sir.
translation.english: Yes, sir. Alright. I’ll inform them, sir.
